name: Grilled Tilapia with Orange Salsa
author: LARMIAK
summary: Tilapia is cooked on an indoor grill, topped with a juicy and slightly spicy orange salsa. Perfect for those on a low-carb diets.
ingredients: 1  orange, peeled and cut into small chunks
½  jalapeno pepper, seeded and diced
½  lemon, juiced, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine orange chunks, green onions, and jalapeno pepper together in a small bowl
Let sit until flavors combine, about 10 minutes
Season tilapia fillets with lemon juice, salt, and black pepper
Heat butter and oil in a large grill pan over medium-high heat
Cook fish until opaque on one side, about 3 minutes
Flip fish and cook until lightly browned and fish flakes easily with a fork, about 3 minutes more
Top fish with orange salsa and a sprinkle of lemon juice
